items.title: Coffee Table Books About New York
items.abstract: Among coffee-table volumes of local interest are celebrations of landmarks, federal courthouses, Central Park paintings and the Dakota.

items.title: New York City’s Ferry Fleet Is Off to a Fast Start
items.abstract: In the six months since it began, NYC Ferry has been more popular than forecast, luring some commuters from the crowded and delay-plagued subway.

items.title: After 2 Years, Progress Is Hard to See in Some Struggling City Schools
items.abstract: With a deadline next year in Mayor Bill de Blasio’s $400 million initiative to turn around New York’s troubled schools, much is on the line.
keywords: Boys and Girls High School (Brooklyn, NY)
